message: I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
This is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still here
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and we both lose if this keeps dragging on.
Your 50/50 split was a good try, but I think I can do better
Alice, this is it. We're running out of time. I need you to meet me halfway here before we both lose out.
You're running out of time, I'm not
